Tournaments

Nebula eSports

INFO

Our Rainbow Six Siege team, Red Team competes in many tournaments as listed below. To find out more, or to schedule a scrim go to the contacts page.

UK Prem

Our own Red Team competes in the weekly UK Cup which is ran in the Double Elimination format every Tuesday, where teams face off against each other to gain points to go towards a monthly leader board!

IGL

IGL is a community run competitive cup boasting 4 successful North American seasons. We're currently blazing a path through IGL's first ever European season headed towards our prize.
